settings.heading: Effective Date
settings.row_content:
Effective Date: 23 May 2025


These Terms and Conditions govern your use of the website www.ailsas.com (“Site”), operated by CLYDE ZHAO E-COMMERCE LIMITED (trading as “Ailsas”, “we”, “us”, “our”). By accessing or using this Site, you agree to these terms, which define the legal relationship between you (“Customer”, “you”) and us.

settings.heading: Use of the Website
settings.row_content: By using our Site, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old or under parental supervision. You agree not to misuse the Site or engage in unlawful activity. We reserve the right to deny access, suspend accounts, or cancel orders in case of abuse or violation.

settings.heading: Account Registration
settings.row_content: Each customer may register one account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login information and for all activity under your account.

settings.heading: Orders and Acceptance
settings.row_content: Placing an order on our Site constitutes a purchase offer. We may accept or decline any order at our discretion. We may cancel an order due to product unavailability, price errors, or failed payment verification.

settings.heading: Shipping and Delivery
settings.row_content:
We offer shipping within the UK and selected international destinations. Shipping times are estimated and not guaranteed, as they may be affected by external factors such as public holidays, weather conditions, or courier disruptions.

Risk of loss or damage to the goods passes to you only once they have been delivered to you or to a person identified by you to receive them, in accordance with the Consumer Rights Act 2015.

Orders are generally considered complete upon successful delivery to the address you provided. If your tracking shows the parcel has been delivered but you have not received it, please contact us immediately at hello@ailsas.com. We will investigate the matter with the courier and work with you to reach a fair resolution.

settings.heading: Returns and Refunds
settings.row_content:
You may request a return within 30 days from the date you receive your order.

Returned products must be in their original condition, with all original packaging, tags, and accessories intact. You are entitled to inspect the goods to determine their nature, characteristics, and functionality — similar to how you would in a physical store. If the product shows signs of use beyond what is necessary for this purpose, we reserve the right to deduct a reasonable amount from the refund to reflect any loss in value.

Due to hygiene reasons, wigs must not be worn, altered, cut, bleached, or dyed, and the lace must remain uncut and intact. If your item is delivered with a hygiene seal, once broken, it becomes non-returnable unless faulty.

Refunds are issued to the original payment method within 10 business days after the returned item has been received and inspected. Returns that do not meet the eligibility criteria may be rejected.

settings.heading: Prices, Taxes and Payments
settings.row_content: All prices are in GBP and include UK VAT. International buyers are responsible for any duties, taxes, or clearance charges. We may correct pricing errors or update prices without notice.

settings.heading: Intellectual Property
settings.row_content: All content on the Site belongs to Ailsas or its licensors. You may not use, copy, or distribute content without our written permission.

settings.heading: User Content and Reviews
settings.row_content: By submitting content (e.g. reviews), you grant Ailsas a non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, display, and modify the content. You confirm you own the rights and your content does not infringe third-party rights.

settings.heading: Your Rights and Responsibilities
settings.row_content:
As a customer, you have the right to:

·Receive accurate product and pricing information

·Return eligible products under our return policy

·Request correction, access, or deletion of your personal data

·Contact us to resolve any purchase-related issues

 

You are responsible for:

·Providing accurate shipping and billing information

·Using the website in compliance with laws and our policies

·Respecting our intellectual property and terms of service

settings.heading: Our Rights and Responsibilities
settings.row_content:
As the service provider, Ailsas is responsible for:

·Delivering products as described on the Site

·Offering a transparent return and refund process

·Protecting your personal information under UK data laws

·Responding to customer inquiries in a timely and fair manner

 

We reserve the right to:

·Cancel or limit orders based on product availability or misuse

·Update or discontinue products and services without prior notice

·Restrict access to users who breach our policies or misuse our Site

settings.heading: Limitation of Liability
settings.row_content: To the extent permitted by law, Ailsas is not liable for indirect or incidental losses. This does not affect your statutory consumer rights.

settings.heading: Force Majeure
settings.row_content: We are not liable for failure to perform obligations due to events beyond our control, including natural disasters, war, strikes, or service interruptions.

settings.heading: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
settings.row_content:
These Terms are governed by the laws of the United Kingdom.

·Consumers may file claims in their country of residence or in the UK

·Business users agree to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Scotland

settings.heading: Contact Us
settings.row_content:
If you have questions about these Terms, contact us at:
Email: hello@ailsas.com
